result.title: Bit-Castle : PyGame
result.content:
Hey Developers,
I have developed a game using PyGame and I would like to share it with you people. It is a very simple game with a new concept. I hope you people like it.

Here is the Download Link
This is the link to the LeaderBoard
This is the ReadMe file
GamePlay

I have developed this as a personal project. Contructive feedbacks are welcome but if you are here just to criticize, please don't, it won't help me learn or develop my skills in any manner.
Thanks, I hope you enjoy this game.
See ya on LeaderBoard. ;)
